name: purmemo-mcp
description: Persistent AI memory for Claude. Save conversations automatically and recall past context across every session.
long_description:
pūrmemo gives Claude a memory that persists across sessions and surfaces the right context at the right time.

**What it does:**
- **Save** — Store conversations as living documents that update over time
- **Recall** — Search and surface relevant memories when you need them
- **Auto-capture** — Works silently in the background, capturing every session
- **Cross-platform** — Memories from Claude Desktop, Claude Code, Chrome extension, and more — all in one place

**Tools included:**
- `save_conversation` — Save any conversation to your memory
- `recall_memories` — Search your memory with natural language
- `get_memory_details` — Retrieve a full conversation by ID
- `discover_related_conversations` — Find related memories across all platforms
- `get_user_context` — See your memory stats and recent activity
